                                                        java.lang.String ccard,
                                                        java.lang.String expires,
                                                        java.lang.String cvv,
                                                        boolean isEmployee)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        username - the user name of the new user
        password - the password of the new user
        firstName - the firstName of the new user
        lastName - the lastName of the new user
        email - the email of the new user
        phone - the phone number of the new user
        role - the user role(employee/manger) of the new user
        ccard - the credit card of the new user
        expires - the credit card expires of the new user
        cvv - the user credit card cvv of the new user
        isEmployee - if the new user if employee or not
        Returns:
        the user and the result of the request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when cannot register
